018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
023
024import java.io.Serial;
025
026import org.apiguardian.api.API;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
029
030/**
031 *  This error will be thrown in cases a configuration bean property has an
032 *  inappropriate type, like
033 *  {@link java.io.InputStream}
034 *  or
035 *  {@link java.util.stream.Stream}.
036 *
037 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @version $Id: InappropriateTypeError.java 918 2021-05-15 15:35:03Z tquadrat $
039 *  @since 0.0.1
040 *
041 *  @UMLGraph.link
042 */
043@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: InappropriateTypeError.java 918 2021-05-15 15:35:03Z tquadrat $" )
044@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
045public final class InappropriateTypeError extends Error
046{
047        /*-----------*\
048    ====** Constants **========================================================
049        \*-----------*/
050    /**
051     *  The error message: {@value}.
052     */
053    public static final String MSG_InappropriateType = "The type '%s' is not appropriate for a ConfigBean property.";
054
055        /*------------------------*\
056    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
057        \*------------------------*/
058    /**
059     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
060     *
061     *  @hidden
062     */
063    @Serial
064    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
065
066        /*--------------*\
067    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
068        \*--------------*/
069    /**
070     *  Creates a new {@code InappropriateTypeError} instance.
071     *
072     *  @param  message The message for the error.
073     */
074    public InappropriateTypeError( final String message )
075    {
076        super( message );
077    }   //  InappropriateTypeError()
078
079    /**
080     *  Creates a new {@code InappropriateTypeError} instance.
081     *
082     *  @param  type    The inappropriate type.
083     */
084    public InappropriateTypeError( final Class<?> type )
085    {
086        this( format( MSG_InappropriateType, requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ).getName() ) );
087    }   //  InappropriateTypeError()
088
089    /**
090     *  Creates a new {@code InappropriateTypeError} instance.
091     *
092     *  @param  type    The inappropriate type.
093     */
094    public InappropriateTypeError( final TypeName type )
095    {
096        this( format( MSG_InappropriateType, requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ).toString() ) );
097    }   //  InappropriateTypeError()
098}
099//  class InappropriateTypeError
100
101/*
102 *  End of File
103 */
